Text: I am a teacher of English in Romania! And I have to write a thesis on Teachig English through Movies! It is for a didactical degree! It is difficult for me to find English books here! This Pirate Bay is like a gold mine for me! ( mainly because my salary is just sufficient for me to buy food, but not English books which are here both very rare and very expensive! If you happen to get or have something on the above- mentioned topic please help me! Thanks a lot in advance!

Bigbluesea!
I am patiently waiting for you to upload whatever you have on that topic!
Thanks again!
